comments: The 3-wave sequence with initial values a, b, c is formed by the following construction:a.......a+b+c............3a+5b+6c.....b...b+c...a+2b+2c..2a+4b+5c.......c..........a+2b+3c...
references: J. Kappraff, Beyond Measure, World Scientific, Inc. 2002, p. 497.
formula: a(n)=a(n-1)+a(n-2) if n is odd, a(n)=a(n-1)+a(n-4) if n is even. Also: a(n)=2a(n-2)+a(n-4)-a(n-6).G.f.: (1+x-x^2)/(1-2*x^2-x^4+x^6).
crossrefs: a(2n) forms A006356, a(2n+1)("the middle row") forms A006054. Cf. A038197, A038201, A187070.
author: _Floor van Lamoen_
